titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices and Council. Mich. Armach. C. Granard. Whereas by the ancient laws and statutes of this realm great and heavy penalties are inflicted upon all such as shall be found to be spreaders of false news, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Granard, Arthur Forbes, Earl of, 1623-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty; and are to be sold by Andrew Crooke and Samuel Helsham at the Colledge-Arms in Castle-street.,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
At end of text: Given at the Council-chamber in Dublin the tenth day of July. 1685.
Relates penalties for spreading false news. Cf. Steele.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
